column1: One day Freddie got his papa to build him a small shelf on the tree
column2: about four feet from the ground
column3: so that he could put nuts on it to feed the squirrels. At first the little fellows were very shy
column4: and would not come near the shelf
column5: but sat on the branches of the tree; and we fancied that we heard them saying to each other
column6: "Do you think that little boy would hurt us
column8: and take one of those nuts?"But
